tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_component_type AS SELECT aac.amp_activity_id, ct.name AS component_type, ct.type_id AS component_type_id, c.amp_component_id, f.rep_organization_id AS component_rep_org_id, f.second_rep_organisation_id AS component_second_rep_org_id FROM amp_activity_components aac JOIN amp_components c ON aac.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id JOIN amp_component_type ct ON c.type = ct.type_id LEFT JOIN amp_component_funding f ON c.amp_component_id=f.amp_component_id AND aac.amp_activity_id=f.activity_id;
